item.description:
Whitehall Reservoir in Hopkinton

Sunday April 11, 2010. We will launch at 11:00 am

First trip of the year! It's supposed to be dry and in the 60s Sunday, so this could work. Please dress for the cooler weather. With the water temps a drysuit or wetsuit is HIGHLY recommended.

You MUST wear a PFD.

For more information - http://www.mass.gov/d...

It's directly on Rt. 135 in Hopkinton. I'll leave it to everyone to check a map for their best way there.
item.name: Whitehall Reservoir in Hopkinton
